passives.name: Dream Maker
passives.effects: Every 8 seconds, you gain a ''Blue Dream Bubble'' and a ''Purple Dream Bubble''. Granting a {{tip|heal}} or {{tip|shield}} to an allied champion ''(excluding yourself)'' causes you to grant both of your ''Dream Bubbles'' to them, empowering them for 3 seconds. The ''Blue Bubble'' reduces the next instance of non-{{tip|minion}} damage they take by {{pp|75 to 255 for 13|1;7 to 18|type=your level}} and the ''Purple Bubble'' grants them {{as|{{pp|50 to 170 for 13|1;7 to 18|type=your level}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]] on their next basic attack.
Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.name: Ward
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop.
